Keywords: Avengers , Dark Avengers , Latveria , Soldier , Thunderbolts
Real Name: John Walker
Special Powers
DOOM'S AVENGERS: Other friendly characters with Avengers team ability have Minions of Doom team ability.
MY DINNER WAS TOUGHER THAN YOU!: Energy Shield/Deflection, Invincible.
NO MAN LEFT BEHIND, SOLDIER!: Leadership. When U.S. Agent uses it, if a friendly character was KO'd since your last turn he succeeds on all results except a 1.

This is the economic beast team player dial for John, Missing the leadership isn't a big deal when for half the cost he hits HARDER than the 70 point line and still gives out Doom TA to all Avengers! He'll be a constant factor when building any avengers team.
